scripts.cfn:pkg: mkdir -p build && aws cloudformation package  --template-file ./src/cae-test1.cf.json --output-template build/cae-test1.yaml --s3-bucket cae-test1-deployment-artifacts
scripts.cfn:deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --stack-name cae-test1 --template-file ./build/cae-test1.yaml --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_AUTO_EXPAND CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM
scripts.deploy: npm run build:lambda && npm run s3upload:lambda && npm run cfn:pkg && npm run cfn:deploy
